item.description:
In the Lotniczy Biznes game, we become the president of a new airline, it is an extremely hermetic market and it is difficult for us to "enter the showrooms", especially since other airlines are opening with us, and our friends become their CEOs!

For our lines, every round opens the possibility of making one flight, on which you can either earn or lose, in case few passengers use your line! To make such a flight you have to negotiate the price with other CEOs, whoever gives the most rolls the dice.

Before game starts players draw a card with their main airport, a 'special ability' card and get one aircraft. Players can upgrade their aircraft, take a loan, and bids on flying to a destination. The player who wins the auction rolls the dice to see if they've made a profit. The first player to collect a billion Euro wins the game.

How much and whether you earn on the connection made depends on several factors, such as the economy of your plane, what airport is your home base, random events such as damaged landing gear and especially on how many passengers will use your line! By managing risk well, wisely investing in modernizing your machines or rejecting unprofitable connections, you will develop your airline and achieve success in this hellishly difficult aviation business!

The expanded edition contains : +10 random event cards +2 starting airports cards (this means 7 players can play the game), +2 special ability cards (as above), +20 destination airports (60 vs 40, longer game), aircraft service fee (which you have to pay every round, depends on aircraft type), loans
